data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Throw-in Santos Laguna.
In the minute 4, Tigres drives forward and Julian Quinones gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Tigres awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Tigres are coming forward and Andre Pierre Gignac gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 5, Santos Laguna have a goal kick.
In Nuevo Leon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Tigres at Estadio Universitario (UANL).
In the minute 9, Ball safe as Santos Laguna is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Santos Laguna in the half of Tigres.
Free kick Santos Laguna.
In the minute 14, Goal! Andre Pierre Gignac gives Tigres a 1-0 lead.
Santos Laguna to take a throw-in in Tigres territory.
Octavio Rivero of Santos Laguna gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 18, Free kick for Tigres in their own half.
Rafael Carioca (Tigres) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Tigres takes a corner from the right.
In the minute 20, Tigres's Luis Rodriguez attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Santos Laguna goal kick.
Tigres's Leonardo Fernandez is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 24, Corner awarded to Tigres.
Throw-in for Santos Laguna in the half of Tigres.
Tigres's Julian Quinones misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 26, Goal kick for Santos Laguna at Estadio Universitario (UANL).
Corner awarded to Santos Laguna.
Santos Laguna takes a corner from the left.
In the minute 32, Throw-in for Tigres in their own half.
Andre Pierre Gignac of Tigres smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Throw-in Santos Laguna.
In the minute 36, Can Tigres get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santos Laguna's half?
Fernando Gorriaran (Santos Laguna) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Santos Laguna are pushing forward but Diego Valdes's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 37, It's a goal kick for the home team in Nuevo Leon.
Throw-in for Santos Laguna at Estadio Universitario (UANL).
Free kick for Santos Laguna in the half of Tigres.
In the minute 38, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Tigres awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Tigres pushes forward through Javier Aquino, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 39, It's a goal kick for the home team in Nuevo Leon.
In Nuevo Leon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Fernando Gorriaran (Santos Laguna) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 44, Ball goes out of play for a Tigres goal kick.
Free kick Tigres.
The first-half has ended.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
Eduardo Vargas is replacing Julian Quinones for the home team.
Free kick for Tigres in the half of Santos Laguna.
In the minute 48, Tigres drive forward but Eduardo Vargas is judged offside.
Hugo Rodriguez (Santos Laguna) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Throw-in for Tigres in their own half.
In the minute 50, Ball safe as Tigres is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Tigres to take a throw-in in Santos Laguna territory.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 52, Francisco Meza (Tigres) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Tigres push upfield and Francisco Meza gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Santos Laguna defence.
Tigres's Javier Aquino misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 53, Goal kick for Santos Laguna at Estadio Universitario (UANL).
Corner awarded to Tigres.
Tigres awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 55, Can Santos Laguna get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tigres's half?
Fernando Gorriaran (Santos Laguna) gets a yellow card.
Throw-in for Santos Laguna in the half of Tigres.
In the minute 57, Santos Laguna drive upfield and Octavio Rivero gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Tigres defender.
Andre Pierre Gignac (Tigres) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Tigres takes a corner from the left.
In the minute 58, Tigres to take a throw-in in Santos Laguna territory.
Santos Laguna's Julio Furch is on target but unsuccessful.
Tigres have a goal kick.
In the minute 63, Tigres awarded a free kick in their own half.
Tigres have a goal kick.
Santos Laguna takes a corner from the left.
Throw-in for Santos Laguna close to the penalty box.
In the minute 68, Santos Laguna make their second substitution with Jordan Carrillo replacing Bryan Garnica.
Eduardo Aguirre is on a sub for Octavio Rivero for Santos Laguna.
In the minute 69, Corner awarded to Santos Laguna.
David Andrade is booked for the away team.
Santos Laguna takes a corner from the left.
In the minute 72, Ball goes out of play for a Tigres goal kick.
Throw-in for Tigres in their own half.
Free kick Tigres.
In the minute 74, The home team replace Leonardo Fernandez with Nicolas Lopez.
Jesus Ocejo is on a sub for Julio Furch for Santos Laguna.
In the minute 77, Free kick for Tigres in their own half.
Ball safe as Santos Laguna is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Alan Cervantes is replacing Jose van Rankin for the away team.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Nuevo Leon.
In the minute 79, Santos Laguna awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Santos Laguna.
Eduardo Aguirre of Santos Laguna is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 81, Throw-in for Tigres at Estadio Universitario (UANL).
In Nuevo Leon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Santos Laguna are coming forward and Eduardo Aguirre gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 83, Fernando Gorriaran for Santos Laguna is whistled offside.
Santos Laguna awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Javier Aquino is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 87, Javier Aquino (Tigres) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Eduardo Tercero.
Carlos Salcedo (Tigres) has received a first yellow card.
Throw-in for Tigres in the half of Santos Laguna.
In the minute 89, Luis Rodriguez (Tigres) has received a first yellow card.
Goal kick for Tigres at Estadio Universitario (UANL).
The 2nd half is prolonged by 5 minutes of added time.
Can Tigres get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santos Laguna's half?
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Santos Laguna in the half of Tigres.
In Nuevo Leon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
The match is over. Final score 2-0.
Goal! Tigres extend their lead to 2-0 through Nicolas Lopez.
